description.@en: Every time you draw blood, a horrendous cackling emits from the shrunken head you wear around your neck.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, you automatically inflict Terror upon those whom you deal Damage to with melee weapons. They can suffer from multiple bouts of Terror with these attacks.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but foes who move down the Peril Condition Track are paralyzed and left Helpless, unable to use Movement Actions to get away

criticalFailure.@en: The head begins to cackle, but only in your mindâ€™s eye. You are enervated, moving one step down the Peril Condition Track negatively at the start of your Turns for the Duration of the spell, until you are Incapacitated!

reagents.@en: The shrunken head of a priest, held on a necklace
